page.title: 03SHOPPING IN S.E.LUTON(2)
page.content:
GOING SHOPPING FOR CLOTHES __________________________ There are thirty clothes shops in the Arndale Centre.I have been in some of the shops lots of times.Once I went in Mothercare and bought a T-Shirt. The T-Shirt was white.At Mothercare you can buy lots of things like dresses, shirts and shorts. There are so many shops because people always want to buy clothes.Also,clothes go out of fashion, so people want different clothes.
HOT FOOD SHOPS ______________ There are lots of takeaways in Luton. They all sell different foods so people have a good choice. A takeaway like Macdonalds sells food such as chips or hamburgers and drinks like milkshakes.
